title: Sri Lanka central bank Governor Nivard Cabraal resigns
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s central bank Governor Nivard Cabraal said he had resigned after cabinet ministers had also offered to resign.
“In the context of all Cabinet Ministers resigning, I have today submitted my resignation as Governor, @CBSL to HE President Gotabaya Rajapaksa,” Cabraal said in a twitter.com message.
In the context of all Cabinet Ministers resigning, I have today submitted my resignation as Governor, @CBSL to HE President Gotabaya Rajapaksa. @GotabayaR #SriLanka #GoSL
